monsters.name: Clockwork Myrmidon
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The clockwork myrmidon makes two attacks: two pick attacks or two slam attacks, or one of each.

actions.name: Heavy Pick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Alchemical Flame Jet (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The clockwork myrmidon can spew a jet of alchemical fire in a line 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Any creature in the path of the jet takes 26 (4d12) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. The clockwork myrmidon can use this attack four times before its internal reservoir is emptied.

actions.name: Grease Spray (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: As a bonus action, the clockwork myrmidon's chest can fire a spray of alchemical grease with a range of 30 feet, covering a 10-by-10 foot square area and turning it into difficult terrain. Each creature standing in the affected area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. The clockwork myrmidon can use this attack four times before its internal reservoir is emptied.

actions.name: Alchemical Fireball
actions.desc: The clockwork myrmidon's alchemical flame reservoir explodes when the construct is destroyed, spraying nearby creatures with burning fuel. A creature within 5 feet of the myrmidon takes 19 (3d12) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. This explosion doesn't occur if the clockwork myrmidon has already fired its alchemical flame jet four times.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The clockwork myrmidon is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The clockwork myrmidon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

monsters.name: Crystalline Devil
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The devil makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Betraying Carbuncle
actions.desc: The crystalline devil takes the form of a gemstone worth 500 gp. It radiates magic in this form, but it can't be destroyed. It is fully aware and can see and hear its surroundings. Reverting to its usual form requires another action.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Crystalline Spray (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The crystalline devil magically sprays shards of crystal in a 15-foot cone. Each target in that area takes 17 (7d4) piercing damage, or half damage with a successful DC 15 Dexterity saving throw.

special_abilities.name: Devil's Sight
special_abilities.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The crystalline devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
special_abilities.desc: The crystalline devil deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with an attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the devil that isn't incapacitated and the devil doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
Variant: Devil Summoning
special_abilities.desc:
some crystalline devils have an action option that allows them to summon other devils.

summon Devil (1/Day): The crystalline devil has a 25 percent chance of summoning one crystalline devil

monsters.name: Invisible Stalker
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious
monsters.languages: Auran, understands Common but doesn't speak it

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The stalker makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Faultless Tracker
special_abilities.desc: The stalker is given a quarry by its summoner. The stalker knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The stalker also knows the location of its summoner.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

• Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation
• 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield
• 2nd level (3 slots): misty step, suggestion
• 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, fly
• 4th level (3 slots): greater invisibility, ice storm
• 5th level (1 slot): cone of cold
